short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sums up all of your wishlist items prices and displays it at the top of the wishlist

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Add-on will help you display a visible sum of the wishlist's product item prices at the top of the wishlist page.
